title: MPSA-DenseNet: A novel deep learning model for English accent classification. (arXiv:2306.08798v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: This paper presents three innovative deep learning models for English accent classification: Multi-DenseNet, PSA-DenseNet, and MPSE-DenseNet, that combine multi-task learning and the PSA module attention mechanism with DenseNet. We applied these models to data collected from six dialects of English across native English speaking regions (Britain, the United States, Scotland) and nonnative English speaking regions (China, Germany, India). Our experimental results show a significant improvement in classification accuracy, particularly with MPSA-DenseNet, which outperforms all other models, including DenseNet and EPSA models previously used for accent identification. Our findings indicate that MPSA-DenseNet is a highly promising model for accurately identifying English accents.
context:
Title: MPSA-DenseNet: A novel deep learning model for English accent classification. (arXiv:2306.08798v1 [cs.CL])
Abstract: This paper presents three innovative deep learning models for English accent classification: Multi-DenseNet, PSA-DenseNet, and MPSE-DenseNet, that combine multi-task learning and the PSA module attention mechanism with DenseNet. We applied these models to data collected from six dialects of English across native English speaking regions (Britain, the United States, Scotland) and nonnative English speaking regions (China, Germany, India). Our experimental results show a significant improvement in classification accuracy, particularly with MPSA-DenseNet, which outperforms all other models, including DenseNet and EPSA models previously used for accent identification. Our findings indicate that MPSA-DenseNet is a highly promising model for accurately identifying English accents.
translated_title: MPSA-DenseNet: 一种用于英语口音分类的新型深度学习模型
translated_abstract: 本文提出了三种创新的深度学习模型，用于英语口音分类：Multi-DenseNet，PSA-DenseNet和MPSE-DenseNet，它们将多任务学习和PSA模块注意机制与DenseNet相结合。我们将这些模型应用于收集自英语母语区域（英国，美国，苏格兰）和非英语母语区域（中国，德国，印度）的六种英语方言的数据。我们的实验结果显示分类精度显著提高，特别是MPSA-DenseNet，它在口音识别方面表现优于所有其他模型，包括先前用于口音识别的DenseNet和EPSA模型。我们的研究结果表明，MPSA-DenseNet是一种高度有前途的模型，适用于准确识别英语口音。
tldr: 本文介绍了三种使用DenseNet结合多任务学习和PSA模块注意机制的深度学习模型用于英语口音分类，并通过实验证明MPSA-DenseNet模型在识别英语口音方面具有很高的精确性和前瞻性。
en_tdlr: This paper presents innovative deep learning models, Multi-DenseNet, PSA-DenseNet, and MPSE-DenseNet, that combine multi-task learning and attention mechanism with DenseNet for English accent classification. The experimental results show that MPSA-DenseNet outperforms other models, including DenseNet and EPSA, and is highly promising for accurately identifying English accents.
